text:
Beekeeper https://beekeeper.io | Software Engineer | Zurich, Switzerland | Full-time | Onsite | Visa

We believe in the potential of every employee. We believe work is not just a place, but where you belong. We believe that motivated employees make organizations more successful. We are laser-focused on the 2 billion people working “out in the field” and letting them unleash their potential. Our product is used in 90+ countries in the world.

This is a unique opportunity to contribute to the core product at a tech-driven company. Work on all of our software stack and learn about state-of-the art web and mobile development. Technologies that you will work on are ElasticSearch, Realm.io, RabbitMQ, Backbone.js, Docker, Amazon Web Services, MySQL and interfacing them with different programming languages like Python, Java, Objective-C and Javascript.

Read more about the job and watch the video: http://grnh.se/5jlmbo More about Beekeeer: https://beekeeper.io/company/
